subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Ben Roethlisberger has been passing his cognitive medical tests, which have become regular parts of his practice routine since sustaining two concussions in five months. But his performance on the field has not stacked up.
snippet: Ben Roethlisberger has been passing his cognitive medical tests, which have become regular parts of his practice routine since sustaining two concussions in five months. But his performance on the field has not stacked up.
